The trick is, that some of them indeed are, while other are plummeting in a downward spiral of a market... That's why you need an investments advisor, a person who will tell you right financial decisions from wrong financial mistakes...

[/tm_pb_slide][tm_pb_slide heading="Set your own pace" button_text="Read more" button_link="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_52382-sample/about-us/" background_image="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_52382-sample/wp-content/uploads/2016/06/slide02.jpg" background_position="default" background_size="cover" background_color="#ffffff" use_bg_overlay="off" use_text_overlay="off" alignment="center" allow_player_pause="off" text_border_radius="3" header_font_select="Merriweather" header_font="Merriweather||||" body_font_select="default" body_font="||||" custom_button="off" button_font_select="default" button_font="||||" button_use_icon="default" button_icon_placement="right" button_on_hover="on" header_font_size="66" header_font_size_tablet="46" header_font_size_phone="36" header_font_size_last_edited="on|phone" header_text_color="#ffffff" body_text_color="#ffffff" body_line_height="1.4em" body_line_height_tablet="1.4em" body_line_height_phone="1.4em"]

We are confident about the fact, that clear goals, a long-term investment philosophy, a balanced portfolio, and low costs create a path to your financial goals. There's investing, and there's smart investing. We're the latter, we're better!

[/tm_pb_slide][tm_pb_slide heading="Why You Need an Advisor?" button_text="Read more" button_link="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_52382-sample/about-us/" background_image="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_52382-sample/wp-content/uploads/2016/06/slide03.jpg" background_position="default" background_size="cover" background_color="#ffffff" use_bg_overlay="off" use_text_overlay="off" alignment="center" allow_player_pause="off" text_border_radius="3" header_font_select="Merriweather" header_font="Merriweather||||" body_font_select="default" body_font="||||" custom_button="off" button_font_select="default" button_font="||||" button_use_icon="default" button_icon_placement="right" button_on_hover="on" header_font_size="66" header_font_size_tablet="46" header_font_size_phone="36" header_font_size_last_edited="on|phone" header_text_color="#ffffff" body_text_color="#ffffff" body_line_height="1.4em" body_line_height_tablet="1.4em" body_line_height_phone="1.4em"]

We help you in creating a financial strategy that represents your personality. Getting to know you is financial advisors primary goal. - An approach centered around your lifes priorities. Its time for a financial strategy that puts your needs and priorities front and center.

[/tm_pb_slide] [/tm_pb_slider][/tm_pb_column][/tm_pb_row]

item.title: hayford_person
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[tm_pb_row admin_label="Row" make_fullwidth="off" use_custom_width="off" use_grid_padding="on" width_unit="on" padding_mobile="off" allow_player_pause="off" parallax="off" parallax_method="off" make_equal="off" parallax_1="off" parallax_method_1="off" parallax_2="off" parallax_method_2="off" parallax_3="off" parallax_method_3="off" parallax_4="off" parallax_method_4="off" column_padding_mobile="on" template_type="row"][tm_pb_column type="1_4"][tm_pb_team_member admin_label="Person" name="Damien Kaschzmarek" image_url="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_52382-sample/wp-content/uploads/2016/06/about-05.jpg" animation="off" background_layout="light" header_text_color="#333333" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" custom_margin="||50px|" header_font="Merriweather||||" header_font_size="26" header_line_height="1.3em" saved_tabs="all" text_alignment="left"]

Damien was appointed as Managing Director of our Investments venture in February 2014, after 4 years as Chief Executive Officer.

[/tm_pb_team_member][/tm_pb_column][tm_pb_column type="1_4"][tm_pb_team_member admin_label="Person" name="Derek Zoolander" image_url="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_52382-sample/wp-content/uploads/2016/06/about-06.jpg" animation="off" background_layout="light" header_text_color="#333333" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" custom_margin="||50px|" header_font="Merriweather||||" header_font_size="26" header_line_height="1.3em" saved_tabs="all" text_alignment="left"]

Derek joined us in 2007, has been Company Secretary since 2010 and was appointed Chief Operating Officer in 2015. He is a Chartered Accountant.

[/tm_pb_team_member][/tm_pb_column][tm_pb_column type="1_4"][tm_pb_team_member admin_label="Person" name="Tom Marvolo" image_url="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_52382-sample/wp-content/uploads/2016/06/about-07.jpg" animation="off" background_layout="light" header_text_color="#333333" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" custom_margin="||45px|" header_font="Merriweather||||" header_font_size="26" header_line_height="1.3em" saved_tabs="all" text_alignment="left"]

He has over 30 years experience in financial and investment accounting and has extensive experience in the management of the portfolio...

[/tm_pb_team_member][/tm_pb_column][tm_pb_column type="1_4"][tm_pb_team_member admin_label="Person" name="James Potter" image_url="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_52382-sample/wp-content/uploads/2016/06/about-08.jpg" animation="off" background_layout="light" header_text_color="#333333" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" custom_margin="||50px|" header_font="Merriweather||||" header_font_size="26" header_line_height="1.3em" saved_tabs="all" text_alignment="left"]

Mr. Potter joined us in 2010 as an Investment Analyst and was promoted to Senior Investment Officer. He has long experience as an analyst.

[/tm_pb_team_member][/tm_pb_column][/tm_pb_row]

item.title: accordion_hayford
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[tm_pb_accordion admin_label="Accordion" toggle_font_size="16px" toggle_text_color="#ffffff" body_font_size="16px" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" closed_toggle_background_color="#333333" open_toggle_background_color="#2da5ee" open_toggle_text_color="#ffffff" closed_toggle_text_color="#ffffff" icon_color="#ffffff" saved_tabs="all" template_type="module"] [tm_pb_accordion_item title="Q: How big the scale of the company needs to be that you will work with it? Do you accept requests from SMBs or only from big corporations? " open_toggle_background_color="#2da5ee" open_toggle_text_color="#ffffff" closed_toggle_background_color="#333333" closed_toggle_text_color="#ffffff" icon_color="#ffffff"]

A:  We've never had particularly strict benchmarks on how big a company must be so we can take it onboard. We've always welcomed the SMB businesses to become our clients and highlighted, that in the modern competitive rhythm the business world lives and works in, SMBs need our help more than bog corporations do!

[/tm_pb_accordion_item][tm_pb_accordion_item title="Q: Do you offer not US based, overseas consulting management? "]

A: Of course. Though our company is registered and based in the US (NYC), we can work with any other jurisdiction or country. Footnote: though the main company still needs to be a US registered one..

[/tm_pb_accordion_item][tm_pb_accordion_item title="Q: Do you work in Tax management optimization field? "]

A: No, this is not our field of specialization.

[/tm_pb_accordion_item] [/tm_pb_accordion]

item.title: single_service_hayford
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[tm_pb_section admin_label="section" background_image="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_52382-sample/wp-content/uploads/2016/06/service01.jpg" transparent_background="on" allow_player_pause="off" inner_shadow="off" parallax="off" parallax_method="off" custom_padding="375px||375px|" custom_padding_tablet="200px||200px|" custom_padding_phone="100px||100px|" custom_padding_last_edited="on|phone" padding_mobile="off" make_fullwidth="off" use_custom_width="off" width_unit="on" make_equal="off" use_custom_gutter="off"][tm_pb_row admin_label="Row"][/tm_pb_row][/tm_pb_section][tm_pb_section admin_label="Section" fullwidth="off" specialty="off" transparent_background="on" allow_player_pause="off" inner_shadow="off" parallax="off" parallax_method="off" custom_padding="80px|||" custom_padding_tablet="50px|||" custom_padding_last_edited="on|tablet" padding_mobile="off" make_fullwidth="off" use_custom_width="off" width_unit="on" make_equal="off" use_custom_gutter="off"][tm_pb_row admin_label="Row" make_fullwidth="off" use_custom_width="off" use_grid_padding="on" width_unit="on" padding_mobile="off" allow_player_pause="off" parallax="off" parallax_method="off" make_equal="off" parallax_1="off" parallax_method_1="off" column_padding_mobile="on"][tm_pb_column type="4_4"][tm_pb_text admin_label="Text" text_orientation="left" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid"]

Resources planning

perfect consulting & planning

[/tm_pb_text][/tm_pb_column][/tm_pb_row][tm_pb_row admin_label="Row"][tm_pb_column type="1_2"][tm_pb_image admin_label="Image" src="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_52382-sample/wp-content/uploads/2016/06/single_service01.jpg" show_in_lightbox="off" url_new_window="off" use_overlay="off" animation="off" sticky="off" align="left" force_fullwidth="off" always_center_on_mobile="on" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid"] [/tm_pb_image][/tm_pb_column][tm_pb_column type="1_2"][tm_pb_text admin_label="Text" text_orientation="left" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid"]

Direct communication with an end client is what's at the heart of good business consulting and planning. Our advisors will work closely with your managers to understand your goals and aims. It will benefit the subsequent business plan that we'll be working on.

Most clients hire us to compose a business plan for them. But very often they find that the process they go through is more important than those documents themselves. Our business planning process is quick, thorough, and very inclusive. Though more structurally sophisticated businesses (which often includes IT technologies or any other unique business assets, unusual or multiple revenue streams) may require more time to be processed and assessed by our team. It's the case when we talk about larger organizations where multiple stakeholders are involved. Companies with Board of Directors, Advisory Board, CEO, CFO, COO, CIO, Director of Marketing, Director of Sales, etc are such an examples...

As to business plan development, we will consult you and help you find your perfect business model. On top of that, we will assist you in identifying your most profitable customers, fine-tuning your marketing plan, and surging your sales. We offer an uninfluenced analysis, so your final business plan will be as objective as it needs to be!

We will cooperate closely with your team to develop your entire business plan. Whether it'll be an "investment fund pitch" or an "exit strategy."

We never use a "template" business plan format. Any business plan we've developed was individually crafted to meet each specific situation or niche. Unlike many of our competitors, we will gladly go through multiple iterations for developing your business plan. We understand that the first draft is rarely perfect. A good business plan must always incorporate such a stage as an independent research on the market and the competition. We usually compile a detailed list of multiple options for your choice. We are business plan advisors, not just business plan "ghost writers".

[/tm_pb_text][/tm_pb_column][/tm_pb_row][tm_pb_row admin_label="Row" make_fullwidth="off" use_custom_width="off" use_grid_padding="on" width_unit="on" padding_mobile="off" custom_margin="50px|||" allow_player_pause="off" parallax="off" parallax_method="off" make_equal="off" parallax_1="off" parallax_method_1="off" column_padding_mobile="on"][tm_pb_column type="4_4"][tm_pb_text admin_label="Text" text_orientation="left" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid"]

If your business plan is to get an investment, we'll evaluate it from the standpoint of a prospective investor. Our experience allows us to quickly detect weak points and fix them long before you meet with your first investor. The consultants we provide become a part of your own team for awhile. All while being just as dedicated to your success. Be sure that no matter how straightforward or multi-layered your business model is, we will figure it out. We'll spend the time and effort necessary to make your business plan a major springboard towards your future success.

[/tm_pb_text][/tm_pb_column][/tm_pb_row][/tm_pb_section][tm_pb_section admin_label="Section" fullwidth="off" specialty="off" transparent_background="on" allow_player_pause="off" inner_shadow="off" parallax="off" parallax_method="off" custom_padding="80px||100px|" custom_padding_tablet="50px||50px|" custom_padding_last_edited="on|desktop" padding_mobile="off" make_fullwidth="off" use_custom_width="off" width_unit="on" make_equal="off" use_custom_gutter="off"][tm_pb_row admin_label="Row" make_fullwidth="off" use_custom_width="off" use_grid_padding="on" width_unit="on" padding_mobile="off" allow_player_pause="off" parallax="off" parallax_method="off" make_equal="off" parallax_1="off" parallax_method_1="off" column_padding_mobile="on"][tm_pb_column type="4_4"][tm_pb_text admin_label="Text" text_orientation="center" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" max_width="834px"]

Request

a free consultation

Would you like to speak to one of our financial advisers? Just submit your contact details and well be in touch shortly. You can also email us if you prefer that type of communication.

I would like to discuss

item.title: accordion_hayford
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[tm_pb_row admin_label="Row" make_fullwidth="off" use_custom_width="off" use_grid_padding="on" width_unit="on" padding_mobile="off" allow_player_pause="off" parallax="off" parallax_method="off" make_equal="off" parallax_1="off" parallax_method_1="off" column_padding_mobile="on" template_type="row"][tm_pb_column type="4_4"][tm_pb_accordion admin_label="Accordion" toggle_font_size="16px" toggle_text_color="#ffffff" body_font_size="16px" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" closed_toggle_background_color="#333333" open_toggle_background_color="#2da5ee" open_toggle_text_color="#ffffff" closed_toggle_text_color="#ffffff" icon_color="#ffffff" saved_tabs="all"] [tm_pb_accordion_item title="Q: How big the scale of the company needs to be that you will work with it? Do you accept requests from SMBs or only from big corporations? " open_toggle_background_color="#2da5ee" open_toggle_text_color="#ffffff" closed_toggle_background_color="#333333" closed_toggle_text_color="#ffffff" icon_color="#ffffff"]

A: We've never had particularly strict benchmarks on how big a company must be so we can take it onboard. We've always welcomed the SMB businesses to become our clients and highlighted, that in the modern competitive rhythm the business world lives and works in, SMBs need our help more than bog corporations do!

[/tm_pb_accordion_item][tm_pb_accordion_item title="Q: Do you offer not US based, overseas consulting management? "]

A: Of course. Though our company is registered and based in the US (NYC), we can work with any other jurisdiction or country. Footnote: though the main company still needs to be a US registered one..

[/tm_pb_accordion_item][tm_pb_accordion_item title="Q: Do you work in Tax management optimization field? "]

A: No, this is not our field of specialization.

[/tm_pb_accordion_item] [/tm_pb_accordion][/tm_pb_column][/tm_pb_row]

item.title: tabs_hayford
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[tm_pb_tabs admin_label="Tabs" active_tab_background_color="#2da5ee" inactive_tab_background_color="#333333" tab_text_color="#ffffff" use_border_color="on" border_color="#ebebeb" border_style="solid" tab_font="Merriweather|on|||" tab_font_size="16" body_font_size="16" saved_tabs="all" template_type="module"] [tm_pb_tab title="Assessment" tab_font_select="default" tab_font="||||" tab_line_height="2em" tab_line_height_tablet="2em" tab_line_height_phone="2em" body_font_select="default" body_font="||||" body_line_height="2em" body_line_height_tablet="2em" body_line_height_phone="2em"]

Firstly we received access to all documentation, reports and structure of the company. We analyzed the current and yearly performance, sales, staff flow for the hayford company... 

[/tm_pb_tab][tm_pb_tab title="Business strategy" tab_font_select="default" tab_font="||||" tab_line_height="2em" tab_line_height_tablet="2em" tab_line_height_phone="2em" body_font_select="default" body_font="||||" body_line_height="2em" body_line_height_tablet="2em" body_line_height_phone="2em"]

The next step was to draft a business strategy for business' future deelopment over a period of 2, 5 and 10 years. We always aim to correlate our recommendations with the vision each company offers, when we're composing such a strategy...

[/tm_pb_tab][tm_pb_tab title="HR optimization" tab_font_select="default" tab_font="||||" tab_line_height="2em" tab_line_height_tablet="2em" tab_line_height_phone="2em" body_font_select="default" body_font="||||" body_line_height="2em" body_line_height_tablet="2em" body_line_height_phone="2em"]

An optimized business always starts with the team optimization. That is the reason we do the human resources diligence and file our suggestions to the board.

[/tm_pb_tab][tm_pb_tab title="Processes optimization" tab_font_select="default" tab_font="||||" tab_line_height="2em" tab_line_height_tablet="2em" tab_line_height_phone="2em" body_font_select="default" body_font="||||" body_line_height="2em" body_line_height_tablet="2em" body_line_height_phone="2em"]

Business processes optimization is the most vital instrument when we aim to turn the company around. We always sketch and implement such overhauls in a close cooperation with company's top management.

[/tm_pb_tab][tm_pb_tab title="Market research" tab_font_select="default" tab_font="||||" tab_line_height="2em" tab_line_height_tablet="2em" tab_line_height_phone="2em" body_font_select="default" body_font="||||" body_line_height="2em" body_line_height_tablet="2em" body_line_height_phone="2em"]

Being one of the most competitive out there, we had conducted multiple researches and we arranged an extensive overhaul for the marketing department of the company.

[/tm_pb_tab][tm_pb_tab title="Year-by-year analysis" tab_font_select="default" tab_font="||||" tab_line_height="2em" tab_line_height_tablet="2em" tab_line_height_phone="2em" body_font_select="default" body_font="||||" body_line_height="2em" body_line_height_tablet="2em" body_line_height_phone="2em"]

After out initial job's been implemented, the next thing we did is a year-by-year analysis. Since year one and during all 6 years we've been advising hayford company shown a significant surge both in sales and market value.

[/tm_pb_tab] [/tm_pb_tabs]

item.title: case_hayford
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[tm_pb_section admin_label="section" background_image="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_52382-sample/wp-content/uploads/2016/06/service01.jpg" transparent_background="on" allow_player_pause="off" inner_shadow="off" parallax="off" parallax_method="off" custom_padding="320px||335px|" custom_padding_tablet="200px||200px|" custom_padding_phone="100px||100px|" custom_padding_last_edited="on|tablet" padding_mobile="off" make_fullwidth="off" use_custom_width="off" width_unit="on" make_equal="off" use_custom_gutter="off"][tm_pb_row admin_label="Row"][tm_pb_column type="4_4"][tm_pb_text admin_label="Text" text_orientation="center" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid"]

Paccar.Inc

[/tm_pb_text][/tm_pb_column][/tm_pb_row][/tm_pb_section][tm_pb_section admin_label="Section" fullwidth="off" specialty="off" transparent_background="on" allow_player_pause="off" inner_shadow="off" parallax="off" parallax_method="off" custom_padding="100px||100px|" custom_padding_tablet="50px||50px|" custom_padding_last_edited="on|desktop" padding_mobile="off" make_fullwidth="off" use_custom_width="off" width_unit="on" make_equal="off" use_custom_gutter="off"][tm_pb_row admin_label="Row"][tm_pb_column type="1_2"][tm_pb_image admin_label="Image" src="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_52382-sample/wp-content/uploads/2016/06/case01.jpg" show_in_lightbox="off" url_new_window="off" use_overlay="off" animation="off" sticky="off" align="left" force_fullwidth="off" always_center_on_mobile="on" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid"] [/tm_pb_image][tm_pb_blurb admin_label="Blurb" title="Our team" url_new_window="off" use_icon="off" icon_color="#49d376" use_circle="off" circle_color="#333333" use_circle_border="off" circle_border_color="#49d376" icon_placement="top" animation="off" text_orientation="left" use_icon_font_size="off" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" header_font_size="46px" header_text_color="#2da5ee" header_font="Merriweather||||" custom_margin="||0px|" custom_margin_phone="||30px|" custom_margin_last_edited="on|phone"]

Ben Edwards, Sam Williams, Robin Smith & Jafrey Lee

Besides the project manager, we also had 4 of our in-house consulting experts staying on this project at all times.

[/tm_pb_blurb][/tm_pb_column][tm_pb_column type="1_2"][tm_pb_blurb admin_label="Blurb" title="Case" url_new_window="off" use_icon="off" icon_color="#49d376" use_circle="off" circle_color="#333333" use_circle_border="off" circle_border_color="#49d376" icon_placement="top" animation="off" text_orientation="left" use_icon_font_size="off" header_text_color="#2da5ee" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" header_font_size="46px" header_font="|on|||"]

Paccar Inc

While working with Paccar Inc automotive company, we conducted few vital market researches and helped to implement a crucial business strategy.

As usually with any company we cooperate with, including the case of the Paccar Inc the whole process has been subjected to 6 distinct and important stages of work:

  • Business' current state of affairs and scope of work assessment
  • Developing a profound, in-depth, short, mid and long-term business strategy in accordance
    with our vision and in consultancy with company's top manager
  • Performing an elaborated optimization for all Recruiting & Human Resources processes,
    which eventually form the future of work dynamics (hence results) of any given company,
    including Paccar Inc
  • Intricate business processes optimization
  • Diligent market researches, performed in a close cooperation with Paccar Inc'
    marketing departmen
  • Post analytics of the year-by-year growth

We're proud of our work as we've dealt with Paccar Inc issues, namely the lack of proper marketing research to reach end customers in a highly competitive auto niche and a lack of a long-term strategy, which based itself off proper marketing research.

The end result of the sales growth and a new lineup of cars developed based on spotting a popular demand made us their regular consulting company!

[/tm_pb_blurb][/tm_pb_column][/tm_pb_row][/tm_pb_section][tm_pb_section admin_label="section" background_image="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_52382-sample/wp-content/uploads/2016/06/service05.jpg" transparent_background="on" allow_player_pause="off" inner_shadow="off" parallax="off" parallax_method="off" custom_padding="290px||290px|" custom_padding_tablet="170px||170px|" custom_padding_phone="100px||100px|" custom_padding_last_edited="on|tablet" padding_mobile="off" make_fullwidth="off" use_custom_width="off" width_unit="on" make_equal="off" use_custom_gutter="off"][tm_pb_row admin_label="Row"][tm_pb_column type="4_4"][tm_pb_text admin_label="Text" text_orientation="center" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid"]

Leader in the design &
manufacture of premium trucks

[/tm_pb_text][/tm_pb_column][/tm_pb_row][/tm_pb_section][tm_pb_section admin_label="Section" fullwidth="off" specialty="off" transparent_background="on" allow_player_pause="off" inner_shadow="off" parallax="off" parallax_method="off" custom_padding="100px|||" custom_padding_tablet="50px|||" custom_padding_last_edited="on|tablet" padding_mobile="off" make_fullwidth="off" use_custom_width="off" width_unit="on" make_equal="off" use_custom_gutter="off"][tm_pb_row admin_label="Row"][tm_pb_column type="4_4"][tm_pb_tabs admin_label="Tabs" active_tab_background_color="#2da5ee" inactive_tab_background_color="#333333" tab_text_color="#ffffff" use_border_color="on" border_color="#ebebeb" border_style="solid" tab_font="Merriweather|on|||" tab_font_size="16" body_font_size="16" saved_tabs="all" custom_css_main_element="max-width: 1190px;||margin: auto;"] [tm_pb_tab title="Assessment" tab_font_select="default" tab_font="||||" tab_line_height="2em" tab_line_height_tablet="2em" tab_line_height_phone="2em" body_font_select="default" body_font="||||" body_line_height="2em" body_line_height_tablet="2em" body_line_height_phone="2em"]

item.title: cases_hayford

[/tm_pb_blurb][/tm_pb_column][tm_pb_column type="1_3"][tm_pb_blurb admin_label="Blurb" title="Janny Choos" url_new_window="off" use_icon="off" icon_color="#49d376" use_circle="off" circle_color="#333333" use_circle_border="off" circle_border_color="#49d376" image="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_52382-sample/wp-content/uploads/2016/05/logo02.png" icon_placement="top" animation="off" text_orientation="center" use_icon_font_size="off" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" header_text_color="#2da5ee" custom_margin="||60px|" custom_margin_tablet="||30px|" custom_margin_last_edited="on|tablet" url="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_52382-sample/cases/janny-choos/"]

This legendary car brand used our Interim management tips back in 2008, and averted the Great Recession slip with our timely help.

[/tm_pb_blurb][/tm_pb_column][tm_pb_column type="1_3"][tm_pb_blurb admin_label="Blurb" title="World news" url_new_window="off" use_icon="off" icon_color="#49d376" use_circle="off" circle_color="#333333" use_circle_border="off" circle_border_color="#49d376" image="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_52382-sample/wp-content/uploads/2016/05/logo03.png" icon_placement="top" animation="off" text_orientation="center" use_icon_font_size="off" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" header_text_color="#2da5ee" custom_margin="||60px|" custom_margin_tablet="||30px|" custom_margin_last_edited="on|desktop" url="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_52382-sample/cases/world-news/"]

Harley-Davidson Inc is an American motorcycle manufacturer. We, together with the US govt helped to diverge the fiscal disaster.

[/tm_pb_blurb][/tm_pb_column][/tm_pb_row][tm_pb_row admin_label="Row" make_fullwidth="off" use_custom_width="off" use_grid_padding="on" width_unit="on" padding_mobile="off" custom_margin_last_edited="on|phone" allow_player_pause="off" parallax="off" parallax_method="off" make_equal="off" parallax_1="off" parallax_method_1="off" parallax_2="off" parallax_method_2="off" parallax_3="off" parallax_method_3="off" column_padding_mobile="on"][tm_pb_column type="1_3"][tm_pb_blurb admin_label="Blurb" title="Strong " url_new_window="off" use_icon="off" icon_color="#49d376" use_circle="off" circle_color="#333333" use_circle_border="off" circle_border_color="#49d376" image="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_52382-sample/wp-content/uploads/2016/05/logo04.png" icon_placement="top" animation="off" text_orientation="center" use_icon_font_size="off" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" header_text_color="#2da5ee" custom_margin="||60px|" custom_margin_tablet="||30px|" custom_margin_last_edited="on|tablet" url="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_52382-sample/cases/strong/"]

An all-American chain, that recovered after dropping in sales in 2008 and since then returned great year-by-year growth...

[/tm_pb_blurb][/tm_pb_column][tm_pb_column type="1_3"][tm_pb_blurb admin_label="Blurb" title="Smart One" url_new_window="off" use_icon="off" icon_color="#49d376" use_circle="off" circle_color="#333333" use_circle_border="off" circle_border_color="#49d376" image="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_52382-sample/wp-content/uploads/2016/05/logo05.png" icon_placement="top" animation="off" text_orientation="center" use_icon_font_size="off" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" header_text_color="#2da5ee" custom_margin="||60px|" custom_margin_tablet="||30px|" custom_margin_last_edited="on|tablet" url="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_52382-sample/cases/smart-one/"]

An online service unlike any other, which we helped to sketch out and put to action a comprehensive investment planning for.

[/tm_pb_blurb][/tm_pb_column][tm_pb_column type="1_3"][tm_pb_blurb admin_label="Blurb" title="Aqua" url_new_window="off" use_icon="off" icon_color="#49d376" use_circle="off" circle_color="#333333" use_circle_border="off" circle_border_color="#49d376" image="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_52382-sample/wp-content/uploads/2016/05/logo06.png" icon_placement="top" animation="off" text_orientation="center" use_icon_font_size="off" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" header_text_color="#2da5ee" custom_margin="||60px|" custom_margin_tablet="||30px|" custom_margin_last_edited="on|tablet" url="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_52382-sample/cases/aqua/"]

General Motors suffered a severe setback in sales and overall market value. We, together with the US govt helped to diverge the fiscal disaster.

[/tm_pb_blurb][/tm_pb_column][/tm_pb_row][tm_pb_row admin_label="Row" make_fullwidth="off" use_custom_width="off" use_grid_padding="on" width_unit="on" padding_mobile="off" custom_margin_last_edited="on|tablet" allow_player_pause="off" parallax="off" parallax_method="off" make_equal="off" parallax_1="off" parallax_method_1="off" parallax_2="off" parallax_method_2="off" parallax_3="off" parallax_method_3="off" column_padding_mobile="on"][tm_pb_column type="1_3"][tm_pb_blurb admin_label="Blurb" title="Olio Company" url_new_window="off" use_icon="off" icon_color="#49d376" use_circle="off" circle_color="#333333" use_circle_border="off" circle_border_color="#49d376" image="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_52382-sample/wp-content/uploads/2016/05/logo07.png" icon_placement="top" animation="off" text_orientation="center" use_icon_font_size="off" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" header_text_color="#2da5ee" custom_margin="||60px|" custom_margin_tablet="||30px|" custom_margin_last_edited="on|tablet" url="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_52382-sample/cases/olio-company/"]

Manufacturer trucks and offers a broad range of services for the over-the-road, construction, municipal and medium duty markets.

[/tm_pb_blurb][/tm_pb_column][tm_pb_column type="1_3"][tm_pb_blurb admin_label="Blurb" title="Richard White" url_new_window="off" use_icon="off" icon_color="#49d376" use_circle="off" circle_color="#333333" use_circle_border="off" circle_border_color="#49d376" image="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_52382-sample/wp-content/uploads/2016/05/logo08.png" icon_placement="top" animation="off" text_orientation="center" use_icon_font_size="off" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" header_text_color="#2da5ee" custom_margin="||60px|" custom_margin_tablet="||30px|" custom_margin_last_edited="on|tablet" url="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_52382-sample/cases/richard-white/"]

BenQCorporation is a Taiwanese multi-national company that sells and markets technology products, consumer electronics, computing.

[/tm_pb_blurb][/tm_pb_column][tm_pb_column type="1_3"][tm_pb_blurb admin_label="Blurb" title="Compact" url_new_window="off" use_icon="off" icon_color="#49d376" use_circle="off" circle_color="#333333" use_circle_border="off" circle_border_color="#49d376" image="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_52382-sample/wp-content/uploads/2016/05/logo09.png" icon_placement="top" animation="off" text_orientation="center" use_icon_font_size="off" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" header_text_color="#2da5ee" custom_margin="||60px|" custom_margin_tablet="||30px|" custom_margin_last_edited="on|tablet" url="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_52382-sample/cases/compact/"]

Compaq was a company founded in 1982, offerings include Presario notebooks and laptop PCs, desktops and computer accessories.

[/tm_pb_blurb][/tm_pb_column][/tm_pb_row][tm_pb_row admin_label="Row" make_fullwidth="off" use_custom_width="off" use_grid_padding="on" width_unit="on" padding_mobile="off" custom_margin_last_edited="on|tablet" allow_player_pause="off" parallax="off" parallax_method="off" make_equal="off" parallax_1="off" parallax_method_1="off" parallax_2="off" parallax_method_2="off" parallax_3="off" parallax_method_3="off" column_padding_mobile="on"][tm_pb_column type="1_3"][tm_pb_blurb admin_label="Blurb" title="Bingo" url_new_window="off" use_icon="off" icon_color="#49d376" use_circle="off" circle_color="#333333" use_circle_border="off" circle_border_color="#49d376" image="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_52382-sample/wp-content/uploads/2016/05/logo10.png" icon_placement="top" animation="off" text_orientation="center" use_icon_font_size="off" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" header_text_color="#2da5ee" custom_margin="||60px|" custom_margin_tablet="||30px|" custom_margin_last_edited="on|tablet" url="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_52382-sample/cases/bingo/"]

That's just one of the hardware/software industry leaders whom we consult on business strategic planning...

[/tm_pb_blurb][/tm_pb_column][tm_pb_column type="1_3"][tm_pb_blurb admin_label="Blurb" title="Be Clener" url_new_window="off" use_icon="off" icon_color="#49d376" use_circle="off" circle_color="#333333" use_circle_border="off" circle_border_color="#49d376" image="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_52382-sample/wp-content/uploads/2016/05/logo11.png" icon_placement="top" animation="off" text_orientation="center" use_icon_font_size="off" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" header_text_color="#2da5ee" custom_margin="||60px|" custom_margin_tablet="||30px|" custom_margin_last_edited="on|tablet" url="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_52382-sample/cases/be-clener/"]

Maxdata was a German company that produced IT products, such as computers, notebooks and monitors.

[/tm_pb_blurb][/tm_pb_column][tm_pb_column type="1_3"][tm_pb_blurb admin_label="Blurb" title="Domino" url_new_window="off" use_icon="off" icon_color="#49d376" use_circle="off" circle_color="#333333" use_circle_border="off" circle_border_color="#49d376" image="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_52382-sample/wp-content/uploads/2016/05/logo12.png" icon_placement="top" animation="off" text_orientation="center" use_icon_font_size="off" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" header_text_color="#2da5ee" custom_margin="||60px|" custom_margin_tablet="||30px|" custom_margin_last_edited="on|tablet" url="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_52382-sample/cases/domino/"]

It's one of our oldest returning clients. Their year-by-year growth, achieved in big part thanks to our advice, is the reason.

[/tm_pb_blurb][/tm_pb_column][/tm_pb_row][/tm_pb_section]

[/tm_pb_blurb][/tm_pb_column][tm_pb_column type="1_4"][tm_pb_blurb admin_label="Blurb" title="Taxes, Estate and Property" url_new_window="off" use_icon="off" icon_color="#49d376" use_circle="off" circle_color="#333333" use_circle_border="off" circle_border_color="#49d376" icon_placement="top" animation="top" text_orientation="center" use_icon_font_size="off" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" image="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_52382-sample/wp-content/uploads/2016/06/icon03-1.png" custom_margin="||60px|" custom_margin_last_edited="on|tablet" custom_margin_tablet="||30px|" url="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_52382-sample/services/taxes-estate-and-property/"]

[/tm_pb_blurb][/tm_pb_column][tm_pb_column type="1_4"][tm_pb_blurb admin_label="Blurb" title="Retirement Planning Management" url_new_window="off" use_icon="off" icon_color="#49d376" use_circle="off" circle_color="#333333" use_circle_border="off" circle_border_color="#49d376" icon_placement="top" animation="top" text_orientation="center" use_icon_font_size="off" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" image="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_52382-sample/wp-content/uploads/2016/06/icon04-1.png" custom_margin="||60px|" custom_margin_last_edited="on|tablet" custom_margin_tablet="||30px|" url="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_52382-sample/services/retirement-planning-management/ "]

item.title: single case
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[tm_pb_section admin_label="section" background_image="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_52382-sample/wp-content/uploads/2016/06/image23.jpg" transparent_background="on" allow_player_pause="off" inner_shadow="off" parallax="off" parallax_method="off" custom_padding="320px||335px|" custom_padding_tablet="200px||200px|" custom_padding_phone="100px||100px|" custom_padding_last_edited="on|tablet" padding_mobile="off" make_fullwidth="off" use_custom_width="off" width_unit="on" make_equal="off" use_custom_gutter="off"][tm_pb_row admin_label="Row"][tm_pb_column type="4_4"][tm_pb_text admin_label="Text" text_orientation="center" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid"]

Horgan Motors

[/tm_pb_text][/tm_pb_column][/tm_pb_row][/tm_pb_section][tm_pb_section admin_label="Section" fullwidth="off" specialty="off" transparent_background="on" allow_player_pause="off" inner_shadow="off" parallax="off" parallax_method="off" custom_padding="100px||100px|" custom_padding_tablet="50px||50px|" custom_padding_last_edited="on|desktop" padding_mobile="off" make_fullwidth="off" use_custom_width="off" width_unit="on" make_equal="off" use_custom_gutter="off"][tm_pb_row admin_label="Row"][tm_pb_column type="1_2"][tm_pb_image admin_label="Image" src="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_52382-sample/wp-content/uploads/2016/06/image29.jpg" show_in_lightbox="off" url_new_window="off" use_overlay="off" animation="off" sticky="off" align="left" force_fullwidth="off" always_center_on_mobile="on" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid"] [/tm_pb_image][tm_pb_blurb admin_label="Blurb" title="Our team" url_new_window="off" use_icon="off" icon_color="#49d376" use_circle="off" circle_color="#333333" use_circle_border="off" circle_border_color="#49d376" icon_placement="top" animation="off" text_orientation="left" use_icon_font_size="off" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" header_font_size="46px" header_text_color="#2da5ee" header_font="Merriweather||||" custom_margin="||0px|" custom_margin_phone="||30px|" custom_margin_last_edited="on|phone"]

Ben Edwards, Sam Williams, Robin Smith & Jafrey Lee

Besides the project manager, we also had 4 of our in-house consulting experts staying on this project at all times.

[/tm_pb_blurb][/tm_pb_column][tm_pb_column type="1_2"][tm_pb_blurb admin_label="Blurb" title="Case" url_new_window="off" use_icon="off" icon_color="#49d376" use_circle="off" circle_color="#333333" use_circle_border="off" circle_border_color="#49d376" icon_placement="top" animation="off" text_orientation="left" use_icon_font_size="off" header_text_color="#2da5ee" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" header_font_size="46px" header_font="|on|||"]

Horgan Motors

While working with Aqua automotive company, we conducted few vital market researches and helped to implement a crucial business strategy.

As usually with any company we cooperate with, including the case of the Paccar Inc the whole process has been subjected to 6 distinct and important stages of work:

  • Business' current state of affairs and scope of work assessment
  • Developing a profound, in-depth, short, mid and long-term business strategy in accordance
    with our vision and in consultancy with company's top manager
  • Performing an elaborated optimization for all Recruiting & Human Resources processes,
    which eventually form the future of work dynamics (hence results) of any given company,
    including Paccar Inc
  • Intricate business processes optimization
  • Diligent market researches, performed in a close cooperation with Paccar Inc'
    marketing departmen
  • Post analytics of the year-by-year growth

We're proud of our work as we've dealt with Aqua issues, namely the lack of proper marketing research to reach end customers in a highly competitive auto niche and a lack of a long-term strategy, which based itself off proper marketing research.

The end result of the sales growth and a new lineup of cars developed based on spotting a popular demand made us their regular consulting company!

[/tm_pb_blurb][/tm_pb_column][/tm_pb_row][/tm_pb_section][tm_pb_section admin_label="section" background_image="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_52382-sample/wp-content/uploads/2016/06/image30.jpg" transparent_background="on" allow_player_pause="off" inner_shadow="off" parallax="off" parallax_method="off" custom_padding="290px||290px|" custom_padding_tablet="170px||170px|" custom_padding_phone="100px||100px|" custom_padding_last_edited="on|tablet" padding_mobile="off" make_fullwidth="off" use_custom_width="off" width_unit="on" make_equal="off" use_custom_gutter="off"][tm_pb_row admin_label="Row"][tm_pb_column type="4_4"][tm_pb_text admin_label="Text" text_orientation="center" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid"]

Leader in the design &
manufacture of premium trucks

[/tm_pb_text][/tm_pb_column][/tm_pb_row][/tm_pb_section][tm_pb_section admin_label="Section" fullwidth="off" specialty="off" transparent_background="on" allow_player_pause="off" inner_shadow="off" parallax="off" parallax_method="off" custom_padding="100px|||" custom_padding_tablet="50px|||" custom_padding_last_edited="on|tablet" padding_mobile="off" make_fullwidth="off" use_custom_width="off" width_unit="on" make_equal="off" use_custom_gutter="off"][tm_pb_row admin_label="Row"][tm_pb_column type="4_4"][tm_pb_tabs admin_label="Tabs" active_tab_background_color="#2da5ee" inactive_tab_background_color="#333333" tab_text_color="#ffffff" use_border_color="on" border_color="#ebebeb" border_style="solid" tab_font="Merriweather|on|||" tab_font_size="16" body_font_size="16" saved_tabs="all" custom_css_main_element="max-width: 1190px;||margin: auto;"] [tm_pb_tab title="Assessment" tab_font_select="default" tab_font="||||" tab_line_height="2em" tab_line_height_tablet="2em" tab_line_height_phone="2em" body_font_select="default" body_font="||||" body_line_height="2em" body_line_height_tablet="2em" body_line_height_phone="2em"]

Firstly we received access to all documentation, reports and structure of the company. We analyzed the current and yearly performance, sales, staff flow for the hayford company...

[/tm_pb_tab][tm_pb_tab title="Business strategy" tab_font_select="default" tab_font="||||" tab_line_height="2em" tab_line_height_tablet="2em" tab_line_height_phone="2em" body_font_select="default" body_font="||||" body_line_height="2em" body_line_height_tablet="2em" body_line_height_phone="2em"]

The next step was to draft a business strategy for business' future deelopment over a period of 2, 5 and 10 years. We always aim to correlate our recommendations with the vision each company offers, when we're composing such a strategy...

[/tm_pb_tab][tm_pb_tab title="HR optimization" tab_font_select="default" tab_font="||||" tab_line_height="2em" tab_line_height_tablet="2em" tab_line_height_phone="2em" body_font_select="default" body_font="||||" body_line_height="2em" body_line_height_tablet="2em" body_line_height_phone="2em"]

An optimized business always starts with the team optimization. That is the reason we do the human resources diligence and file our suggestions to the board.

[/tm_pb_tab][tm_pb_tab title="Processes optimization" tab_font_select="default" tab_font="||||" tab_line_height="2em" tab_line_height_tablet="2em" tab_line_height_phone="2em" body_font_select="default" body_font="||||" body_line_height="2em" body_line_height_tablet="2em" body_line_height_phone="2em"]

Business processes optimization is the most vital instrument when we aim to turn the company around. We always sketch and implement such overhauls in a close cooperation with company's top management.

[/tm_pb_tab][tm_pb_tab title="Market research" tab_font_select="default" tab_font="||||" tab_line_height="2em" tab_line_height_tablet="2em" tab_line_height_phone="2em" body_font_select="default" body_font="||||" body_line_height="2em" body_line_height_tablet="2em" body_line_height_phone="2em"]

Being one of the most competitive out there, we had conducted multiple researches and we arranged an extensive overhaul for the marketing department of the company.

[/tm_pb_tab][tm_pb_tab title="Year-by-year analysis" tab_font_select="default" tab_font="||||" tab_line_height="2em" tab_line_height_tablet="2em" tab_line_height_phone="2em" body_font_select="default" body_font="||||" body_line_height="2em" body_line_height_tablet="2em" body_line_height_phone="2em"]

After out initial job's been implemented, the next thing we did is a year-by-year analysis. Since year one and during all 6 years we've been advising hayford company shown a significant surge both in sales and market value.

item.title: TESTIMONIAL
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[tm_pb_row admin_label="Row" make_fullwidth="off" use_custom_width="off" use_grid_padding="on" width_unit="on" padding_mobile="off" allow_player_pause="off" parallax="off" parallax_method="off" make_equal="off" parallax_1="off" parallax_method_1="off" parallax_2="off" parallax_method_2="off" column_padding_mobile="on" template_type="row"][tm_pb_column type="1_2"][tm_pb_testimonial admin_label="Testimonial" author="Richard Lesberry" url_new_window="off" quote_icon="off" font_icon="f10d" use_background_color="off" background_color="#f5f5f5" text_orientation="left" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" portrait_url="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_52382-sample/wp-content/uploads/2016/06/test1_03.png"]

The investment company I own once signed up for Globaly consultations. That happened back in 1993. Since then, we've been showing a steady year-by-year growth for 23 years long, in big part thanks to timely and spot-on advice by Globaly professionals.

[/tm_pb_testimonial][/tm_pb_column][tm_pb_column type="1_2"][tm_pb_testimonial admin_label="Testimonial" author="Vanessa Hayes" url_new_window="off" quote_icon="off" font_icon="f10d" use_background_color="off" background_color="#f5f5f5" text_orientation="left" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" portrait_url="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_52382-sample/wp-content/uploads/2016/06/test2_03.png"]

As an FMCG company, we always faced a tough competition in our field of market. It gotten only worse since the Great Recession hit us in 2008. But with efficient advice by this renown company, we were able to Winter back from the red digits zone to a green one!

[/tm_pb_testimonial][/tm_pb_column][/tm_pb_row]

[tm_pb_row admin_label="Row" make_fullwidth="off" use_custom_width="off" use_grid_padding="on" width_unit="on" padding_mobile="off" allow_player_pause="off" parallax="off" parallax_method="off" make_equal="off" parallax_1="off" parallax_method_1="off" parallax_2="off" parallax_method_2="off" parallax_3="off" parallax_method_3="off" parallax_4="off" parallax_method_4="off" column_padding_mobile="on" template_type="row"][tm_pb_column type="1_4"][tm_pb_team_member admin_label="Person" name="Damien Kaschzmarek" image_url="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_52382-sample/wp-content/uploads/2016/05/team1.jpg" animation="off" background_layout="light" header_text_color="#333333" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" custom_margin="||50px|" header_font="Merriweather||||" header_font_size="26" header_line_height="1.3em" saved_tabs="all" text_alignment="left"]

Damien was appointed as Managing Director of our Investments venture in February 2014, after 4 years as Chief Executive Officer.

[/tm_pb_team_member][/tm_pb_column][tm_pb_column type="1_4"][tm_pb_team_member admin_label="Person" name="Derek Zoolander" image_url="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_52382-sample/wp-content/uploads/2016/05/team2.jpg" animation="off" background_layout="light" header_text_color="#333333" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" custom_margin="||50px|" header_font="Merriweather||||" header_font_size="26" header_line_height="1.3em" saved_tabs="all" text_alignment="left"]

Derek joined us in 2007, has been Company Secretary since 2010 and was appointed Chief Operating Officer in 2015. He is a Chartered Accountant.

[/tm_pb_team_member][/tm_pb_column][tm_pb_column type="1_4"][tm_pb_team_member admin_label="Person" name="Tom Marvolo" image_url="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_52382-sample/wp-content/uploads/2016/05/team3.jpg" animation="off" background_layout="light" header_text_color="#333333" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" custom_margin="||45px|" header_font="Merriweather||||" header_font_size="26" header_line_height="1.3em" saved_tabs="all" text_alignment="left"]

He has over 30 years experience in financial and investment accounting and has extensive experience in the management of the portfolio...

[/tm_pb_team_member][/tm_pb_column][tm_pb_column type="1_4"][tm_pb_team_member admin_label="Person" name="James Potter" image_url="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_52382-sample/wp-content/uploads/2016/05/team4.jpg" animation="off" background_layout="light" header_text_color="#333333" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" custom_margin="||50px|" header_font="Merriweather||||" header_font_size="26" header_line_height="1.3em" saved_tabs="all" text_alignment="left"]

Mr. Potter joined us in 2010 as an Investment Analyst and was promoted to Senior Investment Officer. He has long experience as an analyst.

[/tm_pb_team_member][/tm_pb_column][/tm_pb_row]
